item.title: ChanoMa
item.description: Overview service for a dual-income households with a small children to tighten family bonds. We decided a dual-income working mother as a primary user because 49% of households are dual-income families in urban area in Japan. -- -- After the implementation. we performed a qualitative and quantitative user evaluation and 75% of participants evaluated “Very Positive” and “Positive” against the whole concept. Therefore, the client decide to launch this App in the next year cycle with considering qualitative feedback comments.
